channel.title: Migration notes on Mach: zig game engine & graphics toolkit
channel.description: Recent content in Migration notes on Mach: zig game engine & graphics toolkit

item.title: Migration notes
item.description: Moved Mach core has moved into the Mach standard library as a module. You can: Check out the latest docs or the examples/ in main Or you might be looking for the older 0.4 branch of Mach, and the docs for that version: https://machengine.org/v0.4/core/
